DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons, Psychic, Fire, Cold

Traits.Name: Cigarette's Life
Traits.Content: The Invisible Smoking Man exists only while its cigarette burns, lasting 1d6 + 2 minutes. When the cigarette extinguishes, the entity dissipates.

Traits.Name: Haunting Glow
Traits.Content: The faint light of the cigarette illuminates a 5-ft. radius in dim red light.

Actions.Name: Smoke Choke
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, dealing 5 (1d8 + 1) necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be unable to speak until the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Coughing Specter
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +3 to hit, dealing 5 (1d8 + 1) necrotic damage. On a hit, the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.
